Suggestion.definition: the act or process of suggesting b
Suggestion.origin: [reference to a party's death in a pleading was not the equivalent of a formal of death on the record " Kissic v. Liberty Nat'l Life Ins. Co. , 641 So. 2d 250 (1994)"]

1 a.definition: the act or process of suggesting

2.definition: an entry on the record of a fact or circumstance (as the death or insolvency of a party) material to a case and essential for the court in making its determination [reference to a party's death in a pleading was not the equivalent of a formal of death on the record ", 641 So. 2d 250 (1994)"]
